content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that the apartment is in a great location and it seems nice. How much are you planning to rent it for?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, I appreciate your acknowledgment about the location and condition of the apartment. I am planning to rent it for €950 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That seems a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. I can offer you €800 per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but €800 per month is too low for such an apartment in the city center. I'm willing to go down to €900 per month, but that's the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I can meet you halfway. I'm willing to rent it for €875 per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a better offer, but still not enough for me. I can accept €890 per month. It's my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think we can agree on that. I agree to the price of [890] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [890] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Haoyu Wang. I hope you enjoy your stay in Magdeburg.

[Your response]
name: Haoyu Wang from China
